meaningMnemonic: What is the <radical>jet</radical> of your <radical>mouth</radical>? It's <kanji>flavor</kanji>. It's what shoots your mouth off, which explains why it hurts so much when you eat something awesome.
readingMnemonic: And what has more <kanji>flavor</kanji> than a big slab of <reading>me</reading>at (み)? You love meat and its flavor nearly as much as you love the flavor of its juice. So many good things to put in your mouth!
